Music

  • New music for July 2014

    Written by Brandon King on Jul 1, 2014

    Including new albums from Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, Dolly Parton and Morrissey.

  • Music at Glastonbury 2014

    Written by Leon Paternoster on Jun 26, 2014

    Download or stream these Glastonbury 2014 artists, including the Manic Street Preachers, Beth Orton and Dolly Parton.

  • New music for June 2014

    Written by Brandon King on May 29, 2014

    Our pick of new, freely available downloads, streaming and CDs. Includes releases from Michael Jackson, First Aid Kit, Celine Dion and Bellowhead.

  • Latest Freegal music downloads

    Written by Leon Paternoster on May 20, 2014

    Our round up of the newest MP3s available for download and streaming for free. Includes Foo Fighters, Frankie Knuckles, Hilary Hahn and Barry Manilow.

  • New music for May 2014

    Written by Brandon King on Apr 28, 2014

    Including releases from Coldplay, The Black Keys, Sam Bailey and Lily Allen.

  • 9 funky Hammond organ classics

    Written by Richard Baker on Apr 7, 2014

    Woodbridge Library's Richard Baker selects some funky Hammond organ classics you can download for free from our Freegal service.

  • New music for April 2014

    Written by Brandon King on Mar 31, 2014

    Including Damon Albarn's Everyday Robots, Eels' latest and Future Islands' Singles.

  • 10 oddball American rock classics

    Written by Richard Baker on Mar 11, 2014

    Download or stream classics from Captain Beefheart, Iron Butterfly and the 13th Floor Elevators. All you'll need is your library card and PIN.

  • New music for March 2014

    Written by Brandon King on Feb 28, 2014

    Including Elbow's new album and a compilation of lost Johnny Cash songs.

  • New music for February 2014

    Written by Brandon King on Feb 5, 2014

    Including releases from Katy B, Cymbals and a compilation of Cello sonatas performed by Anner Bylsma.

  • New music for January 2014

    Written by Brandon King on Jan 27, 2014

    New releases from Bruce Springsteen, September Girls and others.
